text: læa chaw yiw klaw wa chaw khrist nan midi tang xyu bn sing dı læa chaw khrist k klaw a chaw yiw k midi tang xyu bn sing dı thang «thi khea hela nan xan khamphir kan xyu nı thanxng deiywkan brrda phu thi miru kdi klaw chen deiyw kab kha klaw khxng phwk khea dangnan nı wan ki ya mah xallxh ca thrng tadsin rahwang phwk khea nı sing thi phwk khea khadyæng kan
